${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.NAME: Beyond the Stars
${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! ${ModID}:Sanity for each enemy hit.

${ModID}:FlailingTendril.NAME: Flailing Tendril
${ModID}:FlailingTendril.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Lose !M! ${ModID}:Sanity. NL If this costs 0, it hits twice.

${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.NAME: Page of the Dead
${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! ${ModID}:Sanity. NL Add a random Attack that costs 2 to your hand.
${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! ${ModID}:Sanity. NL Add a random Upgraded Attack that costs 2 to your hand.

${ModID}:FamilialCurse.NAME: Familial Curse
${ModID}:FamilialCurse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Lose 4 ${ModID}:Sanity.

${ModID}:GazeTheVoid.NAME: Gaze the Void
${ModID}:GazeTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each *Lunacy played this combat.

${ModID}:AllSeeing.NAME: Eldritch Pact
${ModID}:AllSeeing.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, lose !M! ${ModID}:Sanity. NL Whenever you lose ${ModID}:Sanity, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:EndOfDays.NAME: End of Days
${ModID}:EndOfDays.DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, Channel 1 Dark for each [E] unspent.
${ModID}:EndOfDays.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At end of turn, Channel 1 Dark for each [E] unspent.

${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.NAME: R'lyeh Fhtagn
${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.DESCRIPTION: End your turn. NL Next turn, gain !M! Temporary_HP, gain NL [E] [E] [E] , and enter ${ModID}:Nightmare. Exhaust.

${ModID}:StarSpawn.NAME: Star Spawn
${ModID}:StarSpawn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Channel 1 Plasma. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Lunacy.NAME: Lunacy
${ModID}:Lunacy.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this turn. NL Lose !M! HP and 1 ${ModID}:Sanity. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Lunacy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this turn. NL Lose 1 ${ModID}:Sanity. NL Exhaust.
